basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. FredÂ’s (William A. Frederickson) Mentorship Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree in Psychology. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate or Graduate student in the psychology program 3.0 GPA or higher Enrolled in at least 9 credit hours for graduate students or 12 credit hours for undergraduate students Participant in a student research assistantship when awarded Must include a faculty reference letter Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
